item.description:
Join Us For Conscious Movies
Saturday March 13, 7:00 p.m.

Enjoy movies? Enjoy discussing movies with others? Join us for our Conscious Movie Night!

This month we are featuring:
The Passion of the Christ

The Passion (taken from the Latin word for suffering, but also meaning a profound and transcendent love) refers to the agonizing and ultimately redemptive events in the final twelve hours of Jesus Christ's life, the legacy of which has been reflected upon for the last 2000 years.

If you have ever walked out of a movie theater affected by a powerful film, movie nights at the Center of Light are for you!

These events provide a way for people to talk about inspiring movies on a deeper level and how they affect our lives, our attitudes, our perceptions.

Itâ€™s also a great opportunity to meet like-minded people!

For more details and to RSVP please e-mail Rev. Christine or call at 617-794-8208
item.how_to_find_us: Follow instructions on the front wooden door
item.name: The Passion of the Christ this Saturday
